name: sogeti-academy
description: Home of the source code for Sogeti Academy. This repository is completely open source and therefore contains no passwords, usernames, keys, etc.

scripts.start: start npm run start:dotnet start npm run start:react & start npm run start:angular
scripts.test: npm run test:dotnet & npm run test:angular
scripts.install: npm run install:dotnet & npm run install:angular & npm run install:react
